subject: Leadership
title: Post-Traumatic Growth
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Post-Traumatic Growth.

hook.text: After nearly going bankrupt, a founder rebuilt a stronger company. She credits the crisis for the clarity she now has.

buildup.text: Post-traumatic growth: after severe adversity, some people develop greater strength, perspective, and deeper purpose.

discovery.text: Tedeschi's research: growth occurs when trauma shatters existing beliefs and people rebuild a stronger worldview.

twist.text: Growth isn't automatic. It requires deliberate reflection, social support, and making meaning from suffering.

climax.text: Leaders foster growth by normalizing struggle, offering support, and helping people find purpose in their hardships.

punchline.text: What breaks you can also build youâ€”if you let it.

quiz.question: What is post-traumatic growth?
options: Developing greater strength and purpose after adversity
